meanings.sent1: During the competition, Sarah managed to outshoot all her opponents.
meanings.sent2: The skilled archer was able to outshoot his rival in the final round.
meanings.sent3: The young boy challenged his grandpa to a shooting contest, hoping to outshoot him.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outshoot her own record led her to practice every day.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays outshoot through the clouds, creating a beautiful sunset.

meanings.sent1: The tree's branches outshoot over the fence into the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper's height outshoots all the other buildings in the city.
meanings.sent3: The movie's popularity outshoots the director's expectations.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement outshoots her ability to sit still during the movie.
meanings.sent5: The river's flow outshoots the boundaries of its banks during heavy rain.
